name: ~0 Emission Dogfights
description:
Dogfight in skies dominated by the electric engine and the hydrogen rocket in this intense aerial shooter!

  • Choose from 3 different aircraft each with unique stats.
  • Take on a series of 8 unique missions.
  • Playable with both keyboard and gamepad.
  • Highly adaptable display resolution tested from 640x480 to 1280x720
